    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21382984">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21382984">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21382984">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content21382984">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           <em>
            Contact:
           </em>
           <br />
           <br />
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           <a href="http://libapp.muhlenberg.edu/cannon/SanchezUrbanAfricaDatabaseScavengerHunt.docx">
            Sc
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21382984" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21382985">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21382985">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21382985">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content21382985">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21382985" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21389626">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21389626">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21389626">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Reference works
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21389626">
          <div id="boxatt21389626" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24885768">
              <a id="link_24885768" href="http://www.blackpast.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24885768,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Urban Africa', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24885768}); ">
               BlackPast.org
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               This 13,000 page freely available reference center is dedicated to providing information to the general public on African American history and on the history of the more than one billion people of African ancestry around the world. - See more at: http://www.blackpast.org/#sthash.pYLd1bv3.dpuf
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21382987">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21382987">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21382987">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative commentary in books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21382987">
          <div id="boxatt21382987" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24880848">
              <a id="link_24880848" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24880848,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Urban Africa', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24880846">
              <a id="link_24880846" href="http://books.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24880846,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Urban Africa', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24880846}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               To peak inside books before requesting on interlibrary loan.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24885733">
              <a id="link_24885733" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://universitypublishingonline.org/cambridge/histories/subject_title_list.jsf?seriesCode=CHA&amp;heading=The+Cambridge+History+of+Africa&amp;tSort=title+closed&amp;aSort=author+default_list&amp;ySort=year+default_list" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24885733,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Urban Africa', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12766030}); ">
               Cambridge History of Africa
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               This comprehensive history of Africa contains chapters written by experts in their field. It covers the whole period from early history right up to the 20th century in eight volumes.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21382988">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21382988">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21382988">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative commentary in scholarly journals
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21382988">
          <div id="boxatt21382988" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24885712">
              <a id="link_24885712" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://bsc.chadwyck.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24885712,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Urban Africa', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19275295}); ">
               Black Studies Center
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Historical and current material for researching the past, present and future of African-Americans, the wider African Diaspora, and Africa itself. Scholarly essays, recent periodicals, historical newspaper articles, a periodical index, and more, combined from several resources: Schomburg Studies on the Black Experience, International Index to Black Periodicals (IIBP), The Chicago Defender, and the Black Literature Index. The database is a rich source of full text peer-reviewed journals such as Africa Policy Journal, African American Review, African Arts, African Economic History, African Studies Quarterly, Africana, and scores of others.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24885772">
              <a id="link_24885772" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24885772,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Urban Africa', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24880849">
              <a id="link_24880849" href="http://web.ebscohost.com/ehost/search/advanced?sid=71e8ef1f-0c62-4569-b7af-19c10756dedc%40sessionmgr4004&amp;vid=1&amp;hid=4104" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24880849,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Urban Africa', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24880849}); ">
               Historical Abstracts with Full Text
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Subscription databases, in non-U.S. history.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24880850">
              <a id="link_24880850" href="http://www.jstor.org.muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24880850,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Urban Africa', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24880850}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A subscription database. An archive for many scholarly journals including some in art history.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21389599">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21389599">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21389599">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Primary documents
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21389599">
          <div id="boxatt21389599" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24885716">
              <a id="link_24885716" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://bsc.chadwyck.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24885716,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Urban Africa', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19275295}); ">
               Black Studies Center
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Historical and current material for researching the past, present and future of African-Americans, the wider African Diaspora, and Africa itself. Scholarly essays, recent periodicals, historical newspaper articles, a periodical index, and more, combined from several resources: Schomburg Studies on the Black Experience, International Index to Black Periodicals (IIBP), The Chicago Defender, and the Black Literature Index. The database is a rich source of full text peer-reviewed journals such as Africa Policy Journal, African American Review, African Arts, African Economic History, African Studies Quarterly, Africana, and scores of others.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24885718">
              <a id="link_24885718" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/ttda/start.do?userGroupName=mul_coll" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24885718,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Urban Africa', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12765628}); ">
               Times Digital Archive
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Since its first publication in 1785, The Times (London) has become one of the most preeminent, global daily (except Sundays) newspapers of the 18th- through early 21st-centuries centuries, covering international events, people, places, politics, business news, opinion and debate, entertainment and advertising. The Times Digital Archive makes this highly regarded resource available in an easy-to-navigate, fully-searchable online resource containing every page of every issue within the range of years displayed in the product banner.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21389630">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21389630">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21389630">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Additional web resources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21389630">
          <div id="boxatt21389630" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link24885770">
              <a id="link_24885770" href="http://www.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24885770,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Urban Africa', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19978738}); ">
               Google
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Authoritativeness will vary. Assess author and institutional affiliation.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5680051" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox21382989">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21382989">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21382989">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing Sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content21382989">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides
            </em>
            .
           </a>
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt21382989" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox21382990">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="21382990">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title21382990">
          <div class="bi_text">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Interlibrary Loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_1" id="content21382990">
          Most any item not immediately available in our library or in the research databases can be requested on
          <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
           interlibrary loan
          </a>
          by filling out the appropriate form for
          <a href="https://library.muhlenberg.edu/illj~S0">
           articles
          </a>
          or
          <a href="https://library.muhlenberg.edu/illb~S0">
           books
          </a>
          .
          <div id="boxatt21382990" class="boxatt">
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
    <div id="footer">
